content.text:
[@mrchico](@YJOzij/FotrIDUc6hDFBNV0EvOvvQqe/2YWEiAlWrNk=.ed25519) 

Interesting, does that mean you might be immune to the [white bear problem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ironic_process_theory)?

> Try to pose for yourself this task: not to think of a polar bear, and you will see that the cursed thing will come to mind every minute.
